CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].TempCountry (

CountryName varchar(500), 
CountryCode varchar(3),
lognitude float,
latitude float,
Source varchar(100) 
   
)
WITH
(
    LOCATION='/covid19moderndw/Test/dboCountryCovid19DB.txt'
,   DATA_SOURCE = Covid19ModernDW
,   FILE_FORMAT = TextFileFormat
)
;
